project.name: ex-xparse
project.description: Parse expressions in XPath or XQuery into XML trees using REx generated parsers

project.name: mp3tag-extract
project.description: Extract metadata from mp3 format files using the jaudiotagger library.

project.name: ex-thumbnailator
project.description: An XQuery interface to the thumbnail generator library [thumbnailator]

project.name: ex-schematron
project.description: An XQuery packaging of ISO Schematron for BaseX

project.name: metadata-extract
project.description: An XQuery package to extract image metadata as XML using the Drew Noakes library

project.name: ex-graphviz
project.description: XQuery interface for Graphviz with EXPath packaging.

project.name: ex-dotml
project.description: The dotML library provides conversion from dotML format to graphviz dot
